item.title: How to create snowing effect | PhotoGrid Tutorial
item.description: Apply a filter to lighten your photo. Find Shiny Bright sticker (it's free) and enlarge the snow sticker. Tap the sticker and use eraser to erase the snow on your face ðŸ˜†.
